data.eml:eml: A systematic revision of Neotropical lizards in the clade Hoplocercinae (Squamata: Iguania)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torres-Carvajal, Omar, Etheridge, Richard, Queiroz, Kevin De (2011): A systematic revision of Neotropical lizards in the clade Hoplocercinae (Squamata: Iguania). Zootaxa 2752: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207073
